General_information.Content: This database contains data from international key comparisons for radionuclide metrology since the inception of the international system of reference (SIR) for radionuclide metrology at the BIPM in 1976.
General_information.Note: This version of the machine-readable comparison report is not definitive. The format is under discussion within the CCRI and CIPM to best reflect the requirements of ionizing radiation metrology and to conform to the SI digital framework. Users can use this document to analyse key comparison data and metadata more efficiently with their software. However, users should bear in mind that the format will necessarily evolve in subsequent updates of this key comparison, which will not guarantee the long-term compatibility of their interface.

References.key: Romain Coulon et al 2022 Meas. Sci. Technol. 33 024003 - https://doi.org/10.1088/1361-6501/ac3fc4
Romain Coulon et al 2023 Meas. Sci. Technol. 34 074009 - https://doi.org/10.1088/1361-6501/accd0b

key.name: Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Sn-113(2004)
key.Reference_of_the_published_comparison_re: Ratel G., Michotte C., BIPM comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Sn-113 of activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{113}$Sn, \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/41/1A/06004}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2004, \textbf{41}, Tech. Suppl., 06004}

key.name: Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Sn-113(2016)
key.Reference_of_the_published_comparison_re: Michotte C., Ratel G., Courte S., Kossert K., N\"{a}hle O., Bobin C., L\'{e}py M.-C., Moune M., Garcia-Tora\~{n}o E., Peyres V., Roteta M., Update of the BIPM comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Sn-113 of activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{113}$Sn to include the 2010 results of the PTB (Germany), the LNE-LNHB (France) and the 2011 result of the CIEMAT (Spain), \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/53/1A/06010}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2016, \textbf{53}, Tech. Suppl., 06010}

key.name: Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Sn-113(2022)
key.Reference_of_the_published_comparison_re: Michotte C., Courte S., Nonis M., Coulon R., Fr\'echou C. and L\'{e}py M.-C., Update of the BIPM comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Sn-113 of activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{113}$Sn to include the 2017 result of the LNE-LNHB (France), \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/59/1A/06016}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2022, \textbf{59}, Tech. Suppl., 06016}

key.name: Equivalent activity measured by the SIR / kBq
Relative standard uncertainty (SIR contribution) of the equivalent activity / 1e-4

Data_from_NIST-1975.Comments_on_the_SIR_measurement: Masses higher than the limit of 3.8 g for SIR ampoules; part of the solution (3.9096 g) was transfered to another ampoule at the BIPM, giving an SIR result of 58 790(1700) kBq.

key.name: Combined standard uncertainty of the equivalent activity / kBq

Data_from_NIST-1975.Comments_on_the_equivalent_activity: The half-life used for these SIR measurements is 114.9(1) d.
